about.description: BitCrowdLending is the future of Bitcoin lending and investments

feature1.description: Bitcoin lending can be insecure and unstable

feature2.description: We are developing a secure and reliable platform that will allow confident lending and trading of Bitcoin

feature3.description: We are marketing Bitcoin users who are seeking pooled investments, insurance investments, and in-house escrow accounts through bitcoin

highlight1.description: We will blow our competition away with our focus on enhanced ID verification, superior rating system, and additional safety for investors, all while providing lower fees than others

highlight2.description: Our team will also develop additional features and services, like crypto exchange
